text: The Milan Rastislav Stefanik Order is an award given "to recognize eminent contributions to the defence and security of the Czech and Slovak Federative Republic". It was bestowed by the President of the Czech and Slovak Federative Republic. The award is named after Milan Rastislav Stefanik. {| class="wikitable" style="margin:auto; width:70%;" |- !colspan=5|Ribbon bars |- | style="width:20%; text-align:center;"|85px 1st Class | style="width:20%; text-align:center;"|85px 2nd Class | style="width:20%; text-align:center;"|85px 3rd Class | style="width:20%; text-align:center;"|85px 4th Class | style="width:20%; text-align:center;"|85px 5th Class |} ==List of recipients== * President of the Czech and Slovak Federative Republic - First Class Insignia of the Order * Colonel Josef Adam - Third Class, 1991 * Lieutenant General Jan Ambrus - Third Class, 1992 * Colonel Zdenek Bachurek - Third Class, 1991 * Brigadier General Josef Balabán - Second Class, 1992 * Major Alfred Bartos - Third Class, 1992 * Colonel Vaclav Beran, M.
